idea-plugin.name: Git Pull Reminder
idea-plugin.description:
A lightweight plugin that reminds you to pull before committing when your branch is behind the remote.

Automatically checks for unpulled commits before each Git commit to help you avoid merge conflicts.

Features:

  • Auto-fetch: Automatically executes git fetch to get the latest remote status
  • Smart detection: Compares local branch with remote tracking branch
  • User-friendly dialog: Shows a clear prompt when remote has new commits
  • Flexible options: Pull then commit, commit anyway, or cancel
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.0 - Initial Release
